prereq.p:
To create a custom topology, you must have a user account with one of the following roles:
Network_Explorer_Administrator
Network_Explorer_Operator
Note: To check the currently assigned roles, select the User ID on the top right hand corner, and click View User Profile from the drop-down list. The assigned roles are displayed.
If you do not have the required roles, contact the System administrator.

context.p: This tutorial describes the steps required to create a custom topology. A custom topology is a collection of collections. Custom topology allows you to manage topologies. You can group collections and create customs topologies from these collections.

info.p: 2. Select Create a Custom Topology from the Topology drop-down. The Create a Custom Topology fly-out is displayed.

result.p: The newly created custom topology is displayed in the Topology drop-down and tree.
